name: Hefe Wine
description:
'''Maurice Williams''' (born August 25, 1972), known by his stage names '''Hefe Wine''', '''NuWine''', and '''Wine-O''', is an American [[rapper]] and [[record producer|producer]] from [[Houston, Texas]]. In 2006, his single "Pop My Trunk" appeared on the [[Billboard Top 100]].

In 2014, he received media attention following the release of a [[sex tape]] featuring Williams and his former girlfriend [[Iggy Azalea]].
